headline: Why The PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) Could Beat Earnings Estimates Again
summary: The PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: PNC Declares Dividend of $1.60 on Common Stock
summary: The board of directors of The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE: PNC) declared a quarterly cash dividend on the common stock of $1.60 per share. The dividend will be payable May 5, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business April 16, 2025.
